body_html: I don't think we want you to allow gradient to flow through constant nodes, it would break the autodiff.cpp badly. A warning or an error would be appropriate here. It should say that all requires_grad=True tensors need to be inputs to the trace.
body_text: I don't think we want you to allow gradient to flow through constant nodes, it would break the autodiff.cpp badly. A warning or an error would be appropriate here. It should say that all requires_grad=True tensors need to be inputs to the trace.
body: I don't think we want you to allow gradient to flow through constant nodes, it would break the autodiff.cpp badly. A warning or an error would be appropriate here. It should say that all requires_grad=True tensors need to be inputs to the trace.
